events.message: Customer reported a car accident that occurred at an intersection involving another vehicle. Initial details and photos were provided.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after verifying the description included keywords related to a vehicle collision.
An available claims agent specialized in auto accidents was assigned to handle the case and guide the customer through the process.
The customer was contacted to acknowledge receipt of the claim and given an overview of upcoming steps and timeline expectations.
Request sent to the customer to provide the police report, photos of vehicle damage, and copy of the insurance card.
Customer uploaded all requested documents including police report and detailed photos of the car collision damage on the portal.
Claims team initiated investigation reviewing submitted materials and contacting third parties for additional verification.
Investigation concluded without issue; liability was determined, and damage assessments were verified by experts.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to the customer based on the damage evaluation and policy coverage terms.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the timely communication from the agent.
The claim was officially approved by the claims manager following confirmation of all assessment details.
Settlement payment was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s registered bank account without delay.
The insurance claim was officially closed after successful payment and confirmation of receipt from the customer.
All claim files and documents were securely archived as per regulatory compliance and company policy.
